    • addMeasurement

      public boolean addMeasurement​(com.estg.core.Measurement paramMeasurement) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Adds a measurement to the measurements collection of the container.
      Specified by:
      addMeasurement in interface com.estg.core.Container
      Parameters:
      paramMeasurement - Gets a Measurement.
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - If the provided Measurement is null, if the value is lesser than 0, if the date is before the existing last measurement date and if the for a given date the measurement already exists but the values are different.
